runs.comm: great start by Nannes. . It landed on a length around middle and off and seamed away with bounce to the keeper
length delivery around the off stump, mistimes the punchy stroke to cover
And the first bouncer of the day and Kamran Akmal ducks.
133.7 kmph full delivery and Akmal drives well to the left of mid-off where a fine diving stop is made. It looked as it was going past him when he dived full stretch to make a half-stop
Another fine stop..  Akmal unfurled a fine square drive but the wide third man came across to make another diving stop
skids on towards the hips, swivels to tuck it to deep backward square leg
full in length, tilting in towards the off stump, driven to the off side of the pitch
shuffles towards the off stump, fetched the back-of-length delivery from the off stump and short-arm pulls it superbly wide of long leg .. up up and over
slightly fuller, jabbed away to midwicket
on the off stump line, on a length, stays adjacent to slash it away to third man
short in length outside off stump, guided past backward point
he plays the uppish square drive really well  He lunges forward, opens the bat-face and chips the full delivery over cover point
fullish, moving in towards middle stump line, Salman whips it through midwicket to pick up a boundary
bangs it short, 146.8 kmph, lifting delivery outside off, Salman arches back, tries to dab it to third man but couldn't connect
And again. 147.5 kmph short of length bouncing outside off, Butt tries to cut but is beaten for pace and bounce

moves all round the crease, ends up outside leg stump but Nannes keeps his cool and delivers another bouncing delivery over the middle stump. Butt was trying to carve it over the off side but no wood on leather
full this time, on the middle, nudged towards mid-on and they rush across for the run
short cover in now. And Nannes bangs it short on the middle, Akmal shuffles across, tries to pull but is beaten for pace and is struck on the body
he has flayed that. He charged out, moving outside leg and slashed it away over covers! Ala Ganguly ...
The keeper stands up to the stumps now. Full and outside off, Butt tries a ugly slog and inside edges it to his pad
full and outside off, driven uppishly, falls short of mid-off who could only make a half-stop . It was very powerfully hit by Butt
Top shot. He leaned forward to thump a length delivery in the air but over the non-striker's head. Clean smooth swing of the bat.
slightly short in length, mistimes the cut to the off side
hint of swing, really full up, almost yorker length outside off, dug out to the off side
charges out to play the lofted shot but ends up slicing it over cover but it falls safely just past the fielder running back
low full toss outside off, sliced away straight to deep cover
Butt moves outside leg, and the bowler pushes it well outside off stump
Gone now. He moved away a touch and drilled it but hit it straight to cover. Pakistan lose their first wicket
slips to the pads, easily flicked away without any fuss. Easy pickings
serves a full toss now, but Malik drives straight to cover
gorgeous inside-out drive through extra-cover. Great to watch. He leaned into the shot and got the placement perfectly.
really full up, driven towards mid-off
walks down the track, serves a high full toss, tapped back down the pitch. It looked high enough to be no-balled
fullish, moving in to middle and leg, flicked through square leg
slower one and tilts down leg side, Akmal tries to pull but couldn't put bat to ball
fuller, straighter, mistimes the drive to mid-on
shout for lbw as Akmal goes down on his knees to play a paddle but is struck outside the off stump
slower one, from short of length, Akmal is early into the pull and ends up dragging it to short fine leg
floated on the off stump line, driven back down the pitch
stays adjacent to the line and drives to deep cover
leans forward to drive to cover
floated full on the off stump line, shuffles across to ping the vacant spaces on the leg side and they will come back for two
comes down the track, meets the ball on the full but drives straight to cover
slows up the pace further, dips in front of the charging Malik who drives to long-off
fullish, on the middle stump line, worked through midwicket
drags it short and Akmal rocks play to pull it over deep midwicket. There is a man stationed there and he jumps but the ball dips over him
yorker length outside off, steered to short third man
slower, drags the intended bit hit to long -on
fine yorker on the off stump, dug out to the off side
And there is that Akmal square drive again. This time, he went down on his knee, opened the bat-face and sliced the full ball over backward point
dropped at backward point. Malik sliced the full delivery straight to Zuiderent but he has put it down..Easy chance as well. Clang!
leans forward, drives to cover
charges out to drive to cover
Shot! Akmal cleared the front foot, bent forward a touch and carved a full delivery over cover. Superbly struck
on the pads, tries to put it away but will pick up a leg bye
driven through the on side for couple of runs
floated outside off stump, sweeps it away for a single
flighted full outside off, swept to deep square leg for yet another single
slows up the pace even further, Akmal was looking for the sweep, had to wait for a while and eventually, sweeps it past square leg
moves down the track, quicker one, full, driven to long-off
charges out, almost yorks himself as he goes too hard at the ball and edges it to the pad

holes out to deep midwicket. Akmal fetches the flighted delivery from outside off and goes for the shorter square boundary but slog sweeps it straight to the man. It almost popped out of his hand but he holds the rebound
fullish, on the off stump line, driven to right of long-off
on the leg and middle, nurdled away around the corner
gentle mediumpace, full toss, driven to long-on
full on the off stump, heaved across to deep square leg region ... it ran off the inner half of the bat
low full toss, driven straight to long-on
slower one, outside off stump, full, squeezed through cover point
turned past square leg for a single
walks down the track, bangs it in short of length outside off, guides to short third man region
full delivery on the off stump, swiped away past Younis Khan to long-on..
short in length outside off, cut away for a single
almost holes out to long-off. It was a length delivery and he chipped through the line and just short of the fielder
cuts in towards middle, worked to backward square leg
leans forward to tap it gently to cover for a single
moves outside leg, follows him with a full one, turned through midwicket
yorker on the middle, squeezed past the bowler, who lunges to his left but deflects it away
another neat little yorker, Malik can only dig it out back to the bowler
slightly slower, pushed towards long-on and since it was not hit too hard, they come back for the second run
Another one goes down at deep midwicket. With just five runs scored in the over, Malik went for the big one and chose the on side but couldn't get much power behind it.
full toss, leans forward to push it through mid-on
slows up the pace. Younis is early into the sweep and can only edge it to short fine-leg
drags it shorter and down the leg side, pulled away but can't find much power .. picked up at deep backward square leg
short again and this time outside off stump, Misbah waits before cutting it through backward point
tosses it up, high, dips as a full toss, hit to wide long-on
from wide of the crease, quicker one, skidding in, dabbed to short third man
fullish, moving in, turned to square leg
banged in short, pacy too, swatted away to wide midwicket. Just a single.
shuffles across to clip a short of length delivery bouncing in to square leg.. Again, just one run. Pakistan need more than that. But who is going to bell the cat?
lifting delivery on the middle, pulled weakly past square leg.
shuffles towards off and so Nannes hurls it across outside off, Misbah tries to upper cut it but the ball flies over the blade. Dot ball. precious.
another short pitched delivery, Misbah goes back to push it to extra cover. Fine over from Nannes.
cutting in towards middle and leg, worked to short fine-leg
Wallop. Finally. Younis Khan stops nudging around, clears the front foot and thumps a length delivery over wide midwicket boundary
walks down the track, gets a slower one outside off, run down to third man
slower one, short in length outside off, Misbah edges the pull but gets lucky; it runs well to the left of the diving keeper
fuller, just outside off, Misbah opened his stance and drives it down to long-off
short in length outside off, cut away through the off-side field
yorker length outside off, dragged across towards deep midwicket and they run hard to come back for the second
slower one, loopy outside off, driven to cover
fuller, on the legs, Younis pushes it softly past square leg and runs back for the second
low full toss, on the middle, chipped over the bowler and between long-on and long-off
moves outside leg, comes back to original position, a yorker on middle. squeezed out to point
another yorker attempted, ends up a low dipping full toss, scooped to right of sweeper cover
moves outside leg , on the blockhole, slow through the air, dragged to long-on
full toss and Younis goes down on his knee and sweeps it high over square leg. The captain is showing some real urgency now.
charges down the track and lifts a flighted delivery high over long-off. Big hit. Caught by a spectator.
attempts the sweep but doesn't connect and it rolls off the pad
moves down the track and goes for another six but doesn't connect well this time and holes out to long-on
fine shot. He backed away from the stumps, down on his knee and swung the full delivery over the bowler and perfectly bisected the long-on and long-off
low full toss, biffed down to long-on for couple of runs
slightly slower outside off, didn't quite get the timing behind it but will pick up two runs to the right of sweeper cover
yorker on the off stump, dug out to extra cover
hops back and across, gets a full slower one, turned past square leg
moves outside leg stump, full toss outside off, Afridi lets it go, thinking it would be called wide but it was inside the white line; he had moved too much down the leg
fullish, outside off, sliced off the outer edge to deep point region
He has already clocked 150.3 kmph today. Fires in a yorker this time, can only dig it out for a single
Afridiiiiiiiiii! he cleared the front leg and killed a length delivery high over long-on for a big six
And Nannes gets his revenge! Afridi moved outside leg and Nannes fired it full and straight on the leg stump. Clatter!
almost an yorker on the middle, squeezed out to midwicket
full and straight, lifted in the air but falls short of long-on.
backs outside leg stump, serves a low full toss on the leg and middle, punched to long-off for couple of runs.
